quotes.message: When a person has sex, they're not just having it with that partner, they're having it with everybody that partner has had it with for the past ten years.
quotes.name: Otis Ray Bowen

quotes.message: Sex can be fun after eighty, after ninety, and after lunch!
quotes.name: George Burns

quotes.message: Sex: the thing that takes up the least amount of time and causes the most amount of trouble.
quotes.name: John Barrymore

quotes.message: Women complain about sex more often than men. Their gripes fall into two major categories: (1) Not enough (2) Too much.
quotes.name: Ann Landers

quotes.message: My wife is a sex object. Every time I ask for sex, she objects.
quotes.name: Les Dawson

quotes.message: Ultimately, love is much more important than sex and sex becomes greater when you're really in love.
quotes.name: Calvin Klein

quotes.message: Sex is like snow; you never know how many inches you are going to get or how long it is going to last.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sex is the most wonderful thing on this earth, as long as God is in it. When the Devil gets in it, it's the most terrible thing on this earth.
quotes.name: Billy Graham

quotes.message: Food is like sex. When you abstain, even the worst stuff begins to look good.
quotes.name: Beth McColliste

quotes.message: Women need a reason to have sex. Men just need a place.
quotes.name: Billy Crystal

quotes.message: Sex is emotion in motion.
quotes.name: Mae West

quotes.message: Fast sex, like fast food, is cheap, but it doesn't nourish the body â€“ or the soul.
quotes.name: Suzanne Fields

quotes.message: Physics is like sex: sure, it may give some practical results,but that's not why we do it.
quotes.name: Richard Feynman

quotes.message: Is sex dirty? Only if it's done right.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: If two people loved, they slept together; it was a mathematical formula, tested and proved by human experience.
quotes.name: Graham Greene

quotes.message: Among men, sex sometimes results in intimacy; among women, intimacy sometimes results in sex.
quotes.name: Barbara Cartland

quotes.message: Sex is like washing your faceâ€”just something you do because you have to. Sex without love is absolutely ridiculous. Sex follows love, it never precedes it.
quotes.name: Sophia Loren

quotes.message: Sex is funny and love is serious.
quotes.name: Stephan Jenkins

quotes.message: Sex is not sinful, but sin has perverted it.
quotes.name: Walter Lang

quotes.message: Some things are better than sex, and some are worse, but there's nothing exactly like it.
quotes.name: W. C. Fields

quotes.message: Anybody who believes that the way to a man's heart is through his stomach flunked geography.
quotes.name: Robert Byrne

quotes.message: The price of shallow sex may be a corresponding loss of capacity for deep love.
quotes.name: Shana Alexander

quotes.message: The main thing to remember is that making love is at once the silliest and the most sacred act humans can perform.
quotes.name: Patricia Briggs

quotes.message: Don't do it behind the garden gate.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Every time you have sex, you give away a little piece of your heart, and you give that away too many times and there's just nothing left and you've given away the most important part of yourself.
quotes.name: Daren Kagasoff

quotes.message: Sex is like pizza, even if it's done bad, it's still good.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: The worst sex I've ever had has always been great.
quotes.name: Vince McMahon

quotes.message: Kids in back seats cause accidents, accidents in back seats cause kids.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Sex divorced from love is the thief of personal dignity.
quotes.name: Caitlin Thomas

quotes.message: It doesn't matter what you do in the bedroom as long as you don't do it in the street and frighten the horses.
quotes.name: Mrs. Patrick Campbell

quotes.message: Men get laid, but women get screwed.
quotes.name: Quentin Crisp

quotes.message: Sex without love is as hollow and ridiculous as love without sex.
quotes.name: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.message: I know love and lust don't always keep the same company.
quotes.name: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.message: Sex is more than an act of pleasure, it is a way of showing your appreciation and love to the loved body through her senses.
quotes.name: Baris Gencel

quotes.message: You musn't force sex to do the work of love or love to do the work of sex.
quotes.name: Mary Mccarthy

quotes.message: Sex is only a three-letter word so how can it be dirty?
quotes.name: Erma Bombeck

quotes.message: In a way, comedy is like sex. The more noise you hear, the better you think you're doing.
quotes.name: Ray Romano

quotes.message: Nobody dies from lack of sex. It's lack of love we die from.
quotes.name: Margaret Atwood

quotes.message: Sex and golf are the two things you can enjoy even if you're not good at them.
quotes.name: Kevin Costner

quotes.message: Sex is a part of love. You shouldn't go around doing it unless you are in love.
quotes.name: Bettie Page

quotes.message: Sex is the most fun you can have without laughing.
quotes.name: Woody Allen

quotes.message: No matter how much cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Sex without love is merely healthy exercise.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Everyone is having sex until they fall in love. When you fall in love, then it's making love.
quotes.name: Gilbert Arenas

quotes.message: Sex: the pleasure is momentary, the position ridiculous, and the expense damnable.
quotes.name: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.message: Sex is a flame which uncontrolled may scorch; properly guided, it will light the torch of eternity.
quotes.name: Joseph Fetterman

quotes.message: Sexual union is a holy moment in which a part of Heaven flows into the Earth.
quotes.name: James Redfield
